review_text: This was a good education on practical engaging of people of how you  (your business) can assist them become better at serving the needs of people who come to them.

This is one of the most comprehensive courses I've bought about marketing, especially tailored to a service-based business. However, I believe the principles and strategies taught in this course can be applied to any other business. One important lesson I learned is about simplifying marketing to achieve goals efficiently, instead of chasing after clients and customers like many entrepreneurs do. It's about focusing on what yields the best results based on your specific goals or objectives.
